events.name: Artificial Intelligence - WWCode Speakers Event
events.description: Come join us to hear from leading women in the AI industry. The field of AI has grown and matured over the past 10 years, and it is now the technology to master in order to become the forefront of the industry. We have an amazing lineup of speakers for the night:Angulia Yang Ying, M.Tech, Data Scientist, NUS School of ComputingAyesha Khanna, CEO and Co-founder of ADDO AIAlyssa Ong, Technical Evangelist, Microsoft Agenda:6:30 PM: Registration6:40 PM: Introductions6:45 PM: “What is AI” by Angulia Yang7:00 PM: "Applications in AI: Oppurtunities and Challenges in Asia" by Ayesha Khanna7:30 PM: Food and networking8:15 PM: "Data Science as a Service: Microsoft’s Data Platform Tools" by Alyssa Ong8:45 PM: Wrap Up Psst, this event is intended for ladies only. Host:  Microsoft
events.location: 22CF12, Level 22, Microsoft Singapore, Singapore 018989, One Marina Boulevard

events.name: Future Fridays: Communicating Evidence
events.description:
In this session, we will be experimenting with different ways we can communicate evidence, especially of complex topics, in interactive ways. In reviewing what we have learnt over the past few weeks, we will design games or interactive tools to open up new ways of conversing about complex topics. If you weren't able to join us before, this is a good time to come and catch ourselves up! This will also be when we begin to plan for our exhibition in May/June.

At the end of the series, the product we design will be exhibited in 2 HDB locations so we can share our insights.

If you care about civic education and the future of Singapore, start taking action today!

Please note that you will be signing up a series and not for individual sessions because the sessions are cumulative. The upcoming dates we will be running the sessions are:
-28 April
-5 May
-12 May
-19 May
-26 May

See you soon!
events.location: Sustainable Living Lab (SL2), 1 Tampines Street 73, Singapore 528704
